line1: What the hell do you want?
I could kill you with my bare hands.

line2: My sleigh has run out of power!

line1: No Christmas? What about my presents?

line1: The secret to flight is my Reindeer.
line4: Try asking explorer jack at home for help.

line2: What can I do for you?

line1: Santa's sleigh is stuck. I'm helping him.
line2: He said his Reindeer were the secret to flight.
line3: And that you might be able to help me.

line1: Oh yes, Santa and I have had a few adventures together.
line2: Reindeer magic is a fragile thing. The smallest fluxuation
line3: can easily hinder their ability to use magic.
line4: Fortunately, the process of restoring them is simple.

line1: Bring 100 law, cosmic, and nature runes to the Reindeer.
line2: You'll also need a Wizard's Mind Bomb.
line3: The Wizard's Mind Bomb is for Santa, you can get one from
line4: the Trader Crewmembers, at the docks to the South.

line1: Just make sure you use the items on the Reindeer,
Agree to bring the items to the Reindeer.
So, Jack has you searching for some items.
line2: I'm sure that will help my situation, adventurer.
line3: Once you have the runes, use them on my Reindeer.
line4: After that, you can use the Mind Bomb on me.

line1: After you give the runes to the Reindeer,
line2: bring me a Wizard's mind bomb.

line1: Thank you for giving the runes to my Reindeer.
line2: Please hand me the Wizard's Mind Bomb.

line1: Adventurer! Thank you for all of your help!
line2: My Reindeer have regained their magic ability,
line3: and I got a tasty beverage.

line1: The Wizard's Mind Bomb wasn't essential?
Of course it was! I forgot my wallet, otherwise
line2: I would have visited Starbucks, as usual.
line3: Regardless, you've been a big help.

line1: Thanks for helping me, enjoy your gift.

line1: Happy 2017, Pete! I'm looking forward to it.
Always happy to celebrate. Enjoy yourself!
